items.sentence: Did Tom say he thought it was a good idea for us to do that?
Are you planning to tell Tom why you wanted Mary to do that?
This tastes a little like chicken, but it's actually rabbit.
Tom doesn't know the difference between the truth and a lie.
I was lucky to find an apartment this close to where I work.
I think it would be better to leave things the way they are.
I was wondering if you thought what Tom did was appropriate.
You won't be able to do that, at least not on the first try.
Tom didn't start to sing professionally until he was thirty.
At this time, we still don't know why Tom committed suicide.
